thread.title: This Bollywood Actress Just Got A Non-Bailable Warrant In A Drug Case
thread.title_full: This Bollywood Actress Just Got A Non-Bailable Warrant In A Drug Case

author: Sukriti Gumber
title: This Bollywood Actress Just Got A Non-Bailable Warrant In A Drug Case
text:
Sukriti Gumber Mar . 30 . 2017 Mamta Kulkarni 
A special court in Thane issued a non-bailable warrant against Mamta Kulkarni in a Rs. 2000 crore drug case. Along with her, international drug lord Vijaygiri aka Vicky Goswami has also been issued a warrant. 
According to reports, the police got strong evidence against these two, on the basis of which they want to file a chargesheet. However, they are absconding ever since their name appeared in the drug racket. Also, according to the police, they are the main players in the case and had even set up a well-oiled drug cartel â€“ from procuring raw material of ephedrine within India, to transporting and manufacturing methamphetamine in Kenya. 
Thoughts?
